title: Aptix File & Patch Contract
summary: Defines strict JSON structures, patch rules, path rules, and agent behaviors for Aptix file and patch bundles.
key_points: Two invocation modes: aptix file bundle, aptix file patch
Root must be '.' for backend repos
Paths must be POSIX and relative
Operations: create, replace, delete, patch, gitPatch
Guarded code block with json syntax highlighting recommended
